game.name: TrollFace Quest USA 1
game.description:
Playing out some really tricky and challenging puzzles is the best thing to do online to kill your free hours! We have today brought to you a brand new adventure challenge where you have to test the very limits of your brain and make you LOL. Are you ready to try it out right away? Join TrollFace Quest USA 1 and be prepared to enter the extremely funny and mind-boggling puzzle challenge while assisting you to escape the feeling of boredom like never before!

In this one of the extremely popular point and click adventure series, you have to challenge your cognitive and logic finding abilities to the optimum level possible. Complete all the addictive trolling levels with the USA theme and prove the world that you are no potato head in this HTML5 adventure challenge! Get ready to take you on a memorable journey through multiple tales of Americaâ€™s most legendary! Try not to get tricked by your enemies with the help of detective skills!

Let us see that you are clever enough to solve all the puzzles and make your way towards the victory in each epic point and click quest. Outwit this grinning prankster you meet on the streets of USA to beat his tricks! Your right moves will help you to meet with the popular characters and visit locations from the widely watched movies and clear levels. Try to find out a way to finish the level by using the trial and error! Feel free to use the hints to go to the right direction to complete your puzzle!
